titles.title: To amend the National Labor Relations Act to ensure that the National Labor Relations Board does not decline to assert jurisdiction over the horseracing and dogracing industries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/23/1999--Introduced. Amends the National Labor Relations Act to prohibit the National Labor Relations Board from declining to assert jurisdiction over any labor dispute involving the horse racing and dog racing industries.
